==Dialogue==
===Dialogue Set #1===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Linaha before completing ''[[Is "Intensity" Really the Key?]]'')
:'''???:''' Ki'o-ki'o, where are you...
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #2===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Linaha after completing ''Is "Intensity" Really the Key?'')
:'''Linaha:''' Oh hey, {{Traveler}}, it's you...
:{{DIcon}} Why do you look so down?
::'''Linaha:''' Actually... the hot spring water still feels colder than it used to. I really messed up this time. What am I gonna do when I go back...?
::{{DIcon}} Don't worry, just give it a bit more time.
::'''Linaha:''' Alright, got it...
:{{DIcon}} See you around.
::'''Linaha:''' Um... take care on your way, {{Traveler}}.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Dialogue Set #3===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Linaha after getting the ''[[Wonders of the World]]'' achievement ''[[The Purest Heat]]'')
:'''Linaha:''' It's you, {{Traveler}}! Hehe, long time no see! How have you been?
:{{DIcon}} Has something good happened?
::'''Linaha:''' Hehe, just between us — I discovered that the hot spring's water temperature is back to normal, which is great news for me — now my little Koholasaurs can play freely, and I won't have to worry anymore!
::'''Linaha:''' Next up, time to go have some fun! I'll enjoy the hot springs and the volcano to the fullest!
::{{DIcon}} Enjoy yourself!
::'''Linaha:''' Thanks, {{Traveler}}! You make sure to enjoy yourself too, alright?
:{{DIcon}} See you around.
::'''Linaha:''' Take care, and have a safe journey!
{{Dialogue End}}
